QuestData.Title: The Eye of Shadra
QuestData.Description: Shadra must be summoned, for certain. To allow an opportunity like this to pass us by would be foolish. While the apothecaries can make fine use of the god's venom, they are relatively inexperienced in ritual magic.$B$BFortunately, I am quite familiar with preparing dark convocations. You will bring the scattered parts of Shadra to me, and I will help you bring her to this plane to be taken out.$B$BThe first part is the eye of Shadra, guarded in Agol'watha to the north.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover the Eye of Shadra from Agol'watha.
QuestData.CompletionText: If the tablet was a ruse, I will not be pleased. Did you find the eye?
QuestData.RewardText: I'm pleased, $n. That was quicker than I expected.
